content.html: I LOVE to walk after dark but I am not very good with the astronomical photo ## Challenge I am studing how to take a photo of the moon or the stars. In this one I use some filters to get a better image the day after. (https://fundor333.com/photos/2024/moon-of-middle-summer/)
content.text:
I LOVE to walk after dark but I am not very good with the astronomical photo

## Challenge

I am studing how to take a photo of the moon or the stars. In this one I use some filters to get a better image the day after. (https://fundor333.com/photos/2024/moon-of-middle-summer/)
